NR.NR_desc: Two succeeding data facts are logically parallel to each other

NR_example.after: United State's carbon emission is also increasing

NR.NR_desc: Two succeeding data facts present a contradiction between each other

NR_example.before: India's population rank second in the world
NR_example.after: But India's GDP rank sixth in the world

NR.NR_desc: The latter data fact add more details to the previous one

NR_example.before: Chongqing ranked fifth in  traffic congestion among megacities in Asia in 2020
NR_example.after: September is the most congested month in Chongqing in 2020

NR.NR_desc: The latter data fact is an abstraction of the previous one

NR_example.before: 3.2 billion people in the world own a smartphone in 2019
NR_example.after: The number of smartphone users worldwide continue to increase from 2016 to 2021

NR.NR_desc: The latter data fact is caused by the previous one

NR_example.before: The number of people watching football games is increasing every year
NR_example.after: The price of seats for football games has also increased year by year

NR_example.before: The percentage of obesity and overweight in adults were 19.3% in 2013
NR_example.after: In 2018, the percentage of obesity and overweight in adults were 25.6%

NR.NR_desc: One data fact follow the other one according to the order of time
